name: Association of European Coeliac Societies
membership: Member of IAPO, ISSCD and EPF
goal:
AOECS is the umbrella organisation of European Coeliac Societies and is an independent non-profit association.
2.1. AOECS aims to
2.2.1 represent its full member associations (hereinafter: members) at an international level particularly with respect to European and International institutions
2.2.2 work for the best possible safety, availability and labelling of foods and products suitable for people intolerant to gluten.
2.2.3 foster multi-national research projects on coeliac disease and dermatitis herpetiformis Duhring,
2.2.4 coordinate exchange of information related to the coeliac condition, gluten intolerance, dermatitis herpetiformis Duhring and the suitable diet and work for the social welfare for all people affected by these conditions,
2.2.5 facilitate the sharing of skills and knowledge particularly among new and developing Coeliac Societies.
promote the social condition and work for the social welfare of the people mentioned in No. 2.2
interests: Budget, Food Safety, Public Health, Taxation
euInitiatives:
Regulation of food, drinks and catering industries on management of food allergens- in particular gluten - and information to customers in relation thereto
Taxation of foods for special dietary uses
EU funding for research into coeliac disease and other auto immune disorders
